title: "Verified Identity Pass, Inc." rounded tech sans
content:
Here it is:

[http://www.verifiedidcard.com/global\_images/top\_center\_logo.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20060204152725/http:/www.verifiedidcard.com/global_images/top_center_logo.gif)

Thanks very much!
author: copperfont

comments.content:
Typodermic’s [Report](http://web.archive.org/web/20060204152725/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/report/) is very close, but not identical. It has the right ‘I’ and ‘R’, and might look almost exactly like this with a small amount of ‘squooshing’. It was the first rounded sans I could find with both of those letters right.

- Mike Yanega
